amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $35,956,000 and to increase funds for the National Guard counter-drug program by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $35,956,000 and increase funds for Drug Interdiction and Counter-Drug Activities, Defense by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 292 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 292 (Roll no. 318).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
